President Bush Dick Cheney of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . "He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. He was roundly criticized for his string of 40-point games as a rookie, accused of padding his stats in a push for the Rookie of the Year award-- which he won. Allen Iverson 's response this time: I don't mind taking 40 shots. That's what I do.
